name: Dreieck23
description:
The year is 2007 (I think). After fighting with game projects that needed too many assets to ever being completed by me alone, I challenged myself to make a game with the least amount of assets possible. Equipped with the knowledge of the first chapter of the OpenGL book, I made a game that is a bit light-gun-shooterish but with an interesting scoring system. Brace yourselves!

What comes next?

But that's not all!

So use your mouse and click on the triangles to show them who's boss!

Credits:

Game by Paschalis. You can find me on twitter @pasculator.
Music by Bicycle Repair Man.

Minimum requirements:

It should run on every Windows machine. I made a Linux version back then and I will upload it, if I find it.

Fun:

Have fun!
